channel.title: Shotgun Grunt in WGH
channel.description: Just throwing it out there as a question, how come it was decided to add this guy by the surface elevator? I mean the obvious explanation was to give the player a new weapon to use on the next part of the level. But I kinda thought (and I assumed most others I think the same way) that the shotgun in the security booth at the end of the level was a bit of a reward for the player apon completing the it. Is this so was he just placed there by accident? Either way im fine on the decision but I couldn't help but ask. :thumbup:

item.title: Shotgun Grunt in WGH
item.dc:creator: dky.tehkingd.u
item.description:
I think it’s fine. You hardly get any ammo for it anyway, and by the time you actually get to it at the end of the level, it’s no longer as useful as it would have been had it been introduced earlier.
